A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really loved this movie\, despite the obvious flaws and stupid quirky moments that people are hating on.  It refreshed the brand and created a stronger focus on the force and the greater galaxy rather than just the sovereignty of the Skywalker lineage.  I wish there had been more explanation into Snoke and the Praetorians\, and greater attention to other details but these didn't get in the way of me enjoying this as part of the saga and a movie in it's own right.
